Package at.jku.swe.simcomp.webotsadaptor.service

Class WebotsSimulationInstanceService

java.lang.Object
at.jku.swe.simcomp.webotsadaptor.service.WebotsSimulationInstanceService
All Implemented Interfaces:
at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.simulation.SimulationInstanceService
@Service public class WebotsSimulationInstanceService extends Object implements at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.simulation.SimulationInstanceService
The class keeps track of the all simulation instances registered for the Webots adapter. The class contains a set of all simulations and allows to add and remove instances. The class contains a static set of

    • addSimulationInstance

      public void addSimulationInstance(at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.simulation.SimulationInstanceConfig config) throws at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.exception.BadRequestException
      Method to add a new simulation instance based on a configuration. The method checks, if the simulation is of type Webots, and if instanceID, host and port a new.
      Specified by:
      addSimulationInstance in interface at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.simulation.SimulationInstanceService
      Parameters:
      config - Configuration with the simulation name, simulation type, host and port
      Throws:
      at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.adaptor.endpoint.exception.BadRequestException - gets thrown if the simulation instance has the wrong type, the host and port a already used, or the instance ID already exists.

    • removeSimulationInstance
